meanings.definition: Larvae of certain beetles that feed on the roots of plants.
meanings.sent1: The farmer found rootworms in the soil damaging the crops.
meanings.sent2: The rootworms infestation led to poor plant growth in the field.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rootworms played hide and seek among the plant roots.
meanings.sent4: The rootworms gnawed at the roots like tiny underground beavers.
meanings.sent5: The rootworms left a trail of destruction beneath the surface of the garden.

meanings.definition: A type of pest that can cause damage to crops by feeding on their roots.
meanings.sent1: Farmers use pesticides to control rootworms and protect their crops.
meanings.sent2: The rootworms invaded the cornfield, threatening the harvest.
meanings.sent3: The rootworms held a secret meeting underground to plan their next attack.
meanings.sent4: The rootworms were like silent thieves stealing nutrients from the soil.
meanings.sent5: The farmer battled the rootworms, a fierce underground enemy of the crops.
